My name is Tomáš Hudec (a.k.a. Tommy, ICQ# 56657680). I live in Pardubice, the Czech Republic.
I'm using Debian GNU/Linux on my desktop computers since 1996 and Ubuntu on notebook since 2005. I hope I'll never leave dpkg/apt packaging system.

Some useful links (for me):
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats|Ubuntu & Restricted Formats]]</nowiki>

I compiled <nowiki>[[http://abba.cz/deb/ktorrent_2.1.4~0jdong1_amd64.deb|ktorrent 2.1.4 for amd64]]</nowiki>. You can now use this version from feisty-backports.
* For Dapper: <nowiki>[[http://krusader.sourceforge.net/downloads.php|krusader]]</nowiki> version 1.70.0 fixes crash issue with two names in one dir which only differ in lower/upper case) direct link:<nowiki>[[http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/krusader/krusader_1.70.0-1dapper0_i386.deb?download|krusader 1.70.0 for Dapper]]</nowiki>
